channel.title: Upcycled on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in Upcycled on Morja

item.title: CVETKA
item.description: Cvetka represents a person who accepts the state of being unwanted, the stage of not belonging somewhere or to someone and still seeing through all of it, becoming something more. Not giving up. Blooming in its own way.

item.title: ROZALIJA
item.description: Rozalija, inspired by colorful Salvation Mountain by Leonard Knight in California Desert Area, USA and clothing details and sillhuetes of the 50s, was designed as my 3rd yearsâ€™ final collection as a student of Textile and fashion design at the Faculty of Natural Science and Engineering under the mentorship of prof. Almira Sadar.
